data: On entering Lady Pollexfen’s room for the second time, Janet found that the mistress of Dupley Walls had completed her toilette in the interim, and was now sitting robed in stiff rustling silk, with an Indian fan in one hand and a curiously-chased vinaigrette in the other.
Under Lock and Key: A Story. Volume 2
